history.narrative: Law 10-126, the “Capital Review and Debt Affordability,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 10-470, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 1, 1994, and March 1, 1994, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 24, 1994, it was assigned Act No. 10-219 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 10-126 became effective on May 24, 1994.
